string.text: Every town has a few craftsman. Someone has to make everyday stuff for everyday people and mosts do it themselves.
We grind grains into flour, enrich and bake it into bread. Folks all over the continent value bread as part of their diet. We also make pies of all kinds, for all tastes.
We butcher all sorts of animals, for their meat and hides. Unlike unskilled folks, we make the most of the animal, while giving it a clean death.
We mine local minerals. Iron, limestone, silver or gold, whatever they are.
We dillute and ferment honey in water, making it into a sweet drink. Some folks prefer it over normal beer.
